subject: BANK OF CHICAGO
body:
BANK OF CHICAGO
Dear beneficiary,
This is to acknowledge receipt of your message. Chicago company is eradicating poverty and the scam victims  and you're among the 3 Lucky
people listed.Your ATM MASTER CARD of $50 million dollars was registered with
TNT Express Delivery. You will receive it within 12 hours.Your ATM
MASTER CARD will be handed over to you in person at the address you will
provide below. Note, that ATM MASTER CARD must get to your address
within 12 hours once you reconfirm your receiving address as demanded
below.
CONFIRM YOUR DELIVERY ADDRESS BELOW AND LET US KNOW IF THERE IS ANY
CHANGE:
RECEIVER'S NAME:_
DELIVERY ADDRESS:___
DIRECT CELL NUMBER:_
COUNTRY:___
OCCUPATION:____
E-MAIL (1):___
E-MAIL (2):___
SEX:____
WORKING ID:____
Ask him how you can get your ATM CARD of $50 million dollars
From Chicago company World Bank Group.

subject: Re:   BANK OF CHICAGO
body:
Dear Bank of Chicago,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate the opportunity to receive an ATM Master Card of a million dollars from the Chicago company World Bank Group. I would like to proceed with this, but before I provide any information, could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. How did I become one of the lucky people chosen to receive this ATM Master Card?
2. Can you explain how the delivery process works? Will it be delivered by TNT Express Delivery as mentioned in your message?
3. Is there any specific reason why the card needs to be handed over to me in person at my address?

Once I have a better understanding of these details, I will be able to confirm my delivery address and provide any necessary information.

Best wishes,
Ulysses
